name: CerePath
description:
CerePath is the first brainwave-controlled game!

HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Fire up your headset.

2. Train the headset to respond to your thoughts.

3. View moving targets in Augmented Reality.

4. Fire laser beams at the targets using your thoughts alone!

WHAT DO I NEED TO PLAY?

CerePath requires an Emotiv Insight headset. The headset must be fully charged and ready to go per the manufacturer's instructions.

WHAT ELSE DO I NEED TO KNOW?

Brainwave headsets are on the cutting edge. Consider purchasing one if you do not already own one. They can be used for a variety of things including brainwave entrainment.

For more information on the headset, visit emotiv.com. CerePath is not affiliated with Emotiv, although we do require the use of one of their headsets.
